body:
Hi Mostapha, hi guys!

I am working on a project in Tromsø, Northern-Norway. I found climate data on [https://www.byggforsk.no/side/56/tek-sjekk_energi](https://www.byggforsk.no/side/56/tek-sjekk_energi) (under "Klimadata"), but i.m attaching it too.

I was facing several problems during importing it to Ladybug, I renamed .EPW to .epw, removed the "ø" character, but still it.s missing mtx files.

I.m kinda out of ideas, can you take a look on it?
